TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScriptResourceHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpHandler

summary.span: 提供用于处理作为资源而嵌入程序集的脚本文件请求的 HTTP 处理程序。

span.span: Provides an HTTP handler for processing requests for script files that are embedded as resources in an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类处理所有对通过类引用的嵌入脚本文件的请求 。The class processes all requests for embedded script files that are referenced through the class. 对象检索嵌入的脚本库和脚本库的任何本地化资源。The object retrieves the embedded script library and any localized resources for the script library. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则 对象将在脚本文件末尾添加一个调用，并将其添加到[sys.databases](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cd901c0f-51e2-4c63-9963-158f4a88b008)对象的[sys.application.notifyscriptloaded](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6)方法。If the property is set to `true`, the object adds a call at the end of the script file to the [notifyScriptLoaded](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) method of the [Sys.Application](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cd901c0f-51e2-4c63-9963-158f4a88b008) object. 默认情况下， 类压缩并缓存 Internet Explorer 7 嵌入的脚本文件。By default, the class compresses and caches embedded script files for Internet Explorer 7. 可以通过类的和属性关闭压缩和 缓存 。You can turn compression and caching off through the and properties of the class. 在 Web.config 文件中设置这些属性。You set these properties in the Web.config file. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过在 Web.config 文件的 " [clientTarget](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/6379d90d(v=vs.100)) " 部分中创建 internet explorer 7 的别名，为 internet explorer 的早期版本启用压缩功能。You can turn compression on for earlier versions of Internet Explorer by creating an alias for Internet Explorer 7 in the [clientTarget](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/6379d90d(v=vs.100)) section of the Web.config file. 然后以编程方式将属性的值设置 为该别名。You then programmatically set the value of the property to that alias. 但是，我们不建议使用此方法，因为这会导致性能降低，并导致错误的高风险。However, we do not recommend this approach because it will cause a decrease in performance and it introduces a high risk of errors. 启用了 AJAX 的 ASP.NET Web 应用程序的默认 Web.config 文件将添加 为处理程序。The default Web.config file for AJAX-enabled ASP.NET Web applications adds the as a handler. 可以通过在 Web.config 文件中包含以下元素，手动将处理程序添加到应用程序中：You can manually add the handler to your application by including the following element in the Web.config file: ``` ```

span.span: Processes HTTP Web requests for a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

exception.span: 嵌入脚本的调试版和发行版的类型名称不匹配。

span.span: The type names for the debug and release versions of the embedded script do not match.
